fields.description:
*User Story*

As the LogixPanel Team,

We want to conduct testing for importing Novox clients to Novox LogixPanel and LogixCRM

So that we can verify that this implementation works properly and smoothly.





*References*

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/DA-1005|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/DA-1005|smart-link]





*Acceptance Criteria*

# Conduct testing of importing clients to Novox LogixPanel and LogixCRM {color:#ff5630}(Ginny to provide clients data){color}. In regards to syncing MT4 fields, LogixPanel fields and LogixCRM API field for Accounts. Refer to the excel file below.

[^Novox Migration to LP & CRM.xlsx]

2. After step 2 is completed, conduct testing for Treasury functions alongside some of the accounts. 

3. Verify if data from CRM has passed to LP alongside some of the accounts.

fields.description:
*User Story*

As the LogixPanel Team,

We want to push the set up and changes of LogixPanel (Admin & Client Portal) in Dev Env to Prod Env

So that our whitelabel client (Blueberry Markets) can utilise it.





*Acceptance Criteria*

# Ensure the set up and changes of BBM LogixPanel (Admin & Client Portal) are appropriate and meets the requirements from both our side and client.
# Deploy BBM LogixPanel (Admin & Client Portal) Dev Env to Prod Env.



{color:#ff5630}Note: No QA. Require UAT by PMO.{color}

[https://client-bbm.logixpanel.com/|https://client-bbm.logixpanel.com/|smart-link]

Thanks

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a whitelabel client (Novox) in regards to Synergy Markets,

I want to integrate FORM with Novox LogixPanel (Admin & Client Portal) and LogixCRM

So that our clients can register and have accounts managed alongside these systems.





*Acceptance Criteria*

# Integrate Novox FORM{color:#ff5630} (work with OW team - Wayne) {color}([https://www.synergymarkets.com/open-live-account/|https://www.synergymarkets.com/open-live-account/]) to work and sync with:
## Novox LogixPanel Admin Portal ([+https://admin.synergymarkets.com+|https://admin.synergymarkets.com/])
## Novox LogixPanel Client Portal ([https://secure.synergymarkets.com|https://secure.synergymarkets.com/])
## Novox LogixCRM ([https://synergy.crm.zerologix.com|https://synergy.crm.zerologix.com/])
# Conduct QA testing.
## Should also include the following:
### Emails from LogixCRM
### Emails from LogixPanel {color:#ff5630}({color}[~accountid:5c3c29950ecffa5e96d945e1] {color:#ff5630}to clarify for ASIC/VFSC clients){color}



{color:#ff5630}Note: For later date, upon release to client, clean any testing data.{color}

fields.description:
*User Story*

As whitelabel clients (Blueberry Markets and Novox),

I want to have Get Trader API

So that it can be utilised with our BBM and Novox LogixPanel.





*References*

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/~189975882/pages/119603507/Zerologix+-+LogixPanel+Admin+API+document|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/~189975882/pages/119603507/Zerologix+-+LogixPanel+Admin+API+document|smart-link] 

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/~189975882/pages/120651825/Copy+of+LogixPanel+Admin+API+document|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/~189975882/pages/120651825/Copy+of+LogixPanel+Admin+API+document|smart-link] 

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2445|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2445|smart-link]

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2625|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2625|smart-link]





*Acceptance Criteria*

# Build Get Trader API and add into BBM and Novox LogixPanel. Refer to [LP1-2445|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2445] and [LP1-2625|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2625].
# Conduct QA testing for BBM and Novox LogixPanel.

comments.body: [Lincoln Liao|https://gitlab.com/Lincoln0411] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/merge_requests/1200] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / api_cloudhub_panel|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel] on branch [LP1-3031|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/tree/LP1-3031]:{quote}<LP1-3031> Whitelabel Add Get Trader API{quote}

Hi [~accountid:63351855140ba0bf651c116d] this feature was already merged into the master and could be tested in the testing environment, I’ve tested in testing environment and it looks fine, would you please help to test?

QA has completed the manual testing, go to UAT and assign to [~accountid:626f28307de1ec00695822e5] . Thx!

[^LP1-3031【Blueberry Whitelabel】【Novox Whitelabel】Add Get Trader API.pdf]
To conduct UAT alongside QA.

Conducted UAT with [~accountid:63351855140ba0bf651c116d] via Postman and through cross-reference with Admin Portal. The status has been changed to ‘Done’ now. {color:#36b37e}*Passed* {color}result. Thank you [~accountid:62538eb7cdc240007049cc33] as well. FYI [~accountid:61d4f155326554006c015f63]

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a whitelabel client (Novox) in regards to Synergy Markets,

I want to have a LogixPanel (Admin & Client Portal) and LogixCRM

So that I can manage my clients and accounts.





*Background*

Synergy Markets

* [https://www.synergymarkets.com/|https://www.synergymarkets.com/]

Novox

* [https://novoxfx.com/|https://novoxfx.com/]





*Acceptance Criteria*

# *Setup a LogixPanel Admin and Client Portal.*
#* Build Admin Portal (URL should be: [+https://admin.synergymarkets.com+|https://admin.synergymarkets.com/]) and test the following:
#** Admin Settings
#*** Users
#** Clients
#*** Individual Accounts
#*** Corporate Accounts
#** Treasury
#*** Settings
#*** Deposits
#*** Withdrawals
#*** Bank Account Approval
#*** Internal Transfers
#* Build Client Portal (URL should be: [https://secure.synergymarkets.com|https://secure.synergymarkets.com/]) and test the following:
#** Treasury
# *Set up a LogixCRM.*
## Build LogixCRM (URL should be: [https://synergy.crm.zerologix.com|https://synergy.crm.zerologix.com/]) and test the following:
##* Dashboard
##* Leads
##* Accounts
##* Opportunities
##* Reports
##* Setup
##* Profile Setting
# Set up to sync up with form: [https://www.synergymarkets.com/open-live-account/|https://www.synergymarkets.com/open-live-account/] {color:#ff5630}({color}[~accountid:60dbc88470941d0069fc1504] {color:#ff5630}need to work with them).{color}
# Connect to both MT4 and MT5 Demo Server.
# Conduct full regression test for both LogixPanel and LogixCRM.
fields.summary: 【Novox Whitelabel】LogixPanel (Admin & Client Portal) and LogixCRM [Setup Env]
[QA] Write the Test Plan & Test Scopes for Whitelabel - Novox

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a system,

I want to add ‘Source’ column field and tag in both Individual and Corporate Accounts section of Admin Portal

So that I can quickly identify which clients came from which ACY Group’s entities:

* ACY Securities (ASIC)
* ACY Connect (ASIC - to be launched this Friday (30 October 2022) or early next week)
* ACY Capital (VFSC)





*Background*

*ACY Connect*

* ACY Connect is a new entity, under ACY Group, which will be launched very soon. ACY Connect will be a ASIC regulated provider of innovative multi-asset prime broker solutions and services to the Institutional/wholesale client segment. The website: [https://www.acyconnect.com/|https://www.acyconnect.com/]
* ACY Connect website will be launched this Friday (30 October 2022) or early next week.
* ACY Connect form will be launched a little later. The form: [https://www.acyconnect.com/open-live-account/|https://www.acyconnect.com/open-live-account/] {color:#ff5630}(requires company’s VPN to access at the moment){color}



To prepare for when clients who come from ACY Connect, we will need a way to quickly identify them on LogixPanel Admin Portal. Although ACY Connect’s clients will only be pushed to LogixPanel AU, it will be good to futureproof for both AU and LTD.





*Acceptance Criteria*

# *In LogixPanel → AU Admin Portal → Individual Accounts AND Corporate Accounts sections:*
!Source_ColumnField_ToBeAdded.png|width=1905,height=967!
## Add a ‘Source’ column field, between ‘Account Type' and ‘Name’.
!Source_ColumnField_Added.png|width=1905,height=967!
### If a client comes from ACY Securities (Source/Entity): the label, ‘ACY Securities’, should be under the ‘Source’ field for that particular client.
### If a client comes from ACY Connect (Source/Entity): the label, ‘ACY Connect’, should be under the ‘Source’ field for that particular client.
## In Clients' information page:
!ACYAU_SourceTags (2).png|width=1905,height=967!
### Add a ‘Source’ tag, after 'Category' tag.
#### If *Regulation: ASIC* is selected, the droplist should currently contain:
!ASIC_SourceTags_Dropdown.png|width=1905,height=967!
##### ACY Securities
##### ACY Connect
#### If *Regulation: VFSC* is selected, the droplist should currently contain:
!VFSC_SourceTags_Dropdown.png|width=1905,height=967!
##### ACY Capital
## The rest of the logics should remain the same.
## Update and provide ‘Source’ field from existing database to the correct accounts.
## Apply to AU environment.
# *In LogixPanel → LTD Admin Portal → Individual Accounts AND Corporate Accounts sections:*
!Frame 1 (11).png|width=1905,height=967!
## Add a ‘Source’ column field, between ‘Account Type' and ‘Name’.
!Source_ColumnField_Added (2).png|width=1905,height=967!
### If a client comes from ACY Capital (Source/Entity): it should have the label, ‘ACY Capital’, under the ‘Source’ field for that particular client.
## In Clients' information page:
!ACYLTD_SourceTags (1).png|width=1905,height=967!
### Add a ‘Source’ tag, after 'Category' tag.
#### If *Regulation: ASIC* is selected, the droplist should currently contain:
!ASIC_SourceTags_Dropdown (f9584225-c59e-46b7-bcce-893048b8a449).png|width=1905,height=967!
##### ACY Securities
##### ACY Connect
#### If *Regulation: VFSC* is selected, the droplist should currently contain:
!VFSC_SourceTags_Dropdown (91e25f79-5bf6-4be8-824c-18634ce23730).png|width=1905,height=967!
##### ACY Capital
## The rest of the logics should remain the same.
## Update and provide ‘Source’ field from existing database to the correct accounts.
## Apply to LTD environment.

QA already finished all the testing and assign to [~accountid:626f28307de1ec00695822e5]  , u can go to UAT 🫡🫡🫡

[^LP1-2882-[Admin Portal] Add 'Source' column field and tag in Individual and Corporate Accounts section.pdf]

Conducted UAT on both LTD and AU test env along with ASIC and VFSC. {color:#36b37e}*Passed*{color} result. In terms of automatically updates for new traders that create through Form, an enhancement story will be created for this, especially as ACY Connect user can only be created in CRM at the moment, and not LogixPanel. Thank you team! [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] [~accountid:62c24b1ee16ddfe82bdeb92f]

Conducted Post Validation. I cannot seem to select any ‘Source’ tag.
